data.title: Peta Murgatroyd, Maksim Chmerkovskiy reveal rainbow baby‚Äôs name, give first look: ‚ÄòLife is good‚Äô
data.meta_description: Peta Murgatroyd and Maksim Chmerkovskiy shared the name and first snap of their newborn baby boy, who they welcomed on June 18.
data.text:
Peta Murgatroyd and Maksim Chmerkovskiy‚Äôs baby boy has made his Instagram debut.

‚ÄúRio John Chmerkovskiy üíô,‚Äù the Australian professional dancer, 36, wrote on Instagram Wednesday alongside an image of their son, who was born on June 18.

‚ÄúWe are overjoyed to share our baby boy with all of you,‚Äù she continued, adding their 6-year-old son, Shai ‚Äúis already the best big brother and we all feel very complete ü•π.‚Äù

Murgatroyd concluded, ‚ÄúLife is good XO.‚Äù

In the image, Rio comfortably laid on a white comforter while wearing a nude onesie and matching beanie. He also had a nude-colored pacifier in his mouth.

Next to the infant was a circle-shaped board that read, ‚ÄúRio John.‚Äù

Murgatroyd and Chmerkovskiy‚Äôs newborn was sent love from several stars, including Rumer Willis, who commented, ‚ÄúHi sweet boy. I love you already.‚Äù

‚ÄúHe‚Äôs perfect ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è,‚Äù added Jessie James Decker, while Cynthia Bailey simply wrote, ‚Äú‚ù§Ô∏è.‚Äù

On Monday, the ‚ÄúDancing With the Stars‚Äù pros announced that their rainbow baby had arrived.

‚ÄúHappy Father‚Äôs Day to me! #MadeInPeta,‚Äù Chmerkovskiy, 43, captioned a hospital snap of himself holding the baby.

In January, Murgatroyd revealed that she and her husband, who tied the knot in 2017, were expecting a rainbow baby after multiple miscarriages and one round of IVF.

Before Murgatroyd‚Äôs pregnancy, the couple had been very open about the difficulty they faced while trying to conceive another child.

In 2020, Murgatroyd suffered her first pregnancy loss while in a Whole Foods bathroom.

‚ÄúI was sitting in the bathroom sobbing,‚Äù she recalled to People last June. ‚ÄúThat was something that will probably live with me for the rest of my life, being on that toilet by myself, knowing what was happening and not being able to stop it.‚Äù

She then disclosed that she had two other miscarriages, confessing she felt ‚Äúashamed‚Äù and ‚Äúembarrassed‚Äù at the time.

Chmerkovskiy, for his part, told the magazine that he was ‚Äúreally upset‚Äù by the losses.

‚ÄúI never thought that two healthy, athletic people could be in a predicament like this,‚Äù the Ukrainian dancer shared. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a lot to process.‚Äù

The couple began to feel optimistic about conceiving again after speaking to a fertility specialist.
